UPDATE ACT_PENSION_ALLOWANCE_MST T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE T.NUM_ALLOW_ID=? AND T.GNUM_SLNO=? AND T.GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=?
UPDATE ACTPNS_EARN_DEDUCT_PRINT_ORDER T SET T.GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,T.GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,T.GNUM_ISVALID=0 WHERE FSTR_HEAD_CODE=?

UPDATE ACTPAY_ALLOWANCE_MST SET STR_TYPE=?,STR_ALLOW_NAME=?,STR_ALLOW_CODE=?,DT_APPLICABILITY=?,STR_BASIS=?,STR_RATE_FLAG=?,NUM_CONSOLIDATED_FLAG=?,STR_ISEMPLOYEE_SPECIFIC=?,STR_VALIDITY_FLAG=?,STR_ISTAXABLE_FLAG=?,STR_ISPF_CALCULATION=?,STR_OFFICE_NAME=?,STR_GROUP_NAME=?,STR_EMPLOYEE_TYPE=?,STR_EMPLOYEE_CLASS=?,GDT_EFFECTIVE_FRM=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GDT_EFFECTIVE_TO=TO_DATE(?,'DD-MON-YYYY'),GNUM_ISVALID=?,GNUM_SEAT_ID=?,GDT_ENTRY_DATE=?,GDT_LSTMOD_DATE=?,GNUM_LSTMOD_SEATID=?,GSTR_REMARKS=?,NUM_LOWER_BASIC=?,NUM_UPPER_BASIC=?,NUM_AMOUNT=?,NUM_AMOUNT_QUALIFYING=?,GNUM_HOSPITAL_CODE=? WHERE NUM_ALLOW_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=?

WHERE NUM_ALLOW_ID=? AND GNUM_SLNO=? and STR_GRADE_PAY=?
